source.ae59755c:
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(10,5))
sns.distplot(df[df["Gender"] == "Male"]["Income"])
sns.distplot(df[df["Gender"] == "Female"]["Income"])
fig.legend(labels=['Male','Female'])
plt.title("Income distribution - Man and Woman")
plt.show()
